short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple and clean network inspector for GraphQL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A platform agnostic network inspector specifically built for GraphQL. Clearly see individual GraphQL requests including support for query batching. Works with any client including Apollo and Relay.

2.22.1
Subscription support for rails

2.22.0
Configurable subscription endpoint and filtering

2.21.6
operationName for persisted GET and improvements to error handling

2.21.4
Parse compressed requests

2.21.2
Persist filter value
